titleStmt.title: The jolly chair-men. Or, An excellent new song in praise of their employment, which is to be preferr'd before coaches, for the ease of those that cannot bare jumbling. Tune is, Here I love, there I love, &c.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for P. Brooksby, J. Deacon, J. Blare, and J. Back,

notesStmt.note: Possibly cropped, with loss of imprint; imprint suggested by Wing.
Verse: "Come listen well to a jocular song ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
